publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3436 Mr Andy Kerr: Protection of Children (Scotland) Bill - Financial Resolutionâ€”That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Protection of Children (Scotland) Bill, agrees to any expenditure payable out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund in consequence of the Act.Supported by: Cathy Jamieson*, Nicol Stephen*, Peter Peacock*

S1M-3436 Mr Andy Kerr: Protection of Children (Scotland) Bill - Financial Resolution-That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Protection of Children (Scotland) Bill, agrees to any expenditure payable out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund in consequence of the Act. Supported by: Cathy Jamieson, Nicol Stephen, Peter Peacock
